thread.title: Klopp could return to take over at Liverpool
thread.title_full: Klopp could return to take over at Liverpool

title: Klopp could return to take over at Liverpool
text:
Juergen Klopp could return to football to take over at Liverpool after Rodgers exit THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   7:42   7:42   
People: 

LIVERPOOL, England â€” Juergen Klopp appears to be close to taking over as Liverpool manager. 
Representatives of the former Borussia Dortmund coach are in talks with the Premier League club, which fired Brendan Rodgers on Sunday after the team's 18-month slump since nearly winning the league title in 2014. 
Liverpool could make a new appointment by the end of the week. The team's next game is against Tottenham on Oct. 17. 
The 48-year-old Klopp has been out of work since leaving Dortmund at the end of last season after winning two German league titles. He is regarded as one of European football's most respected coaches. 
Former Real Madrid coach Carlo Ancelotti is also considered to be a potential candidate to replace Rodgers.
